author: Anonymous Calc
title: Windows update
question: Did anyone update Windows OS lately (March-22 update) and survived to tell? My computer screams for an update and runs slowly, but I don't want to update just before the final.
student_answer:
Regardless of whether or not others’ computers update successfully without issue, it’s difficult to say whether yours will or not. I’d hold off until after the final just in case… we’re on the home stretch, and wouldn’t want anything to happen.
The macOS fiasco right before midterm 2 serves as a warning! Some had issues, some didn’t.
